name: Docker (outside-of-docker for Alpine)
description: Re-use the host docker socket, adding the Docker CLI to an Alpine container. Feature invokes a script to enable using a forwarded Docker socket within a container to run Docker commands.

version.description: Select or enter a Docker CLI version. (Availability can vary by OS version.)

dockerDashComposeVersion.description: Compose version to use for docker-compose (v1 or v2 or none)

github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: This dev container includes the Docker CLI (`docker`) pre-installed and available on the `PATH` for running and managing containers using the Docker daemon on the host machine.
